Others: Reid Detmers returned to the Majors after a three-month stint at Triple-A Salt Lake
Detmers struck out 10 over six strong frames in a 6-2 loss against the Los Angeles Dodgers
Detmers allowed two runs on just three hits and two walks while throwing exactly 100 pitches
Detmers' four-seamer and slider were particularly effective
Detmers faced Shohei Ohtani in his first game as a visitor at Angel Stadium
Ohtani grounded out to first in his first at-bat
In the third inning, Ohtani sparked a two-run rally for the Dodgers with an RBI triple
Detmers settled down from the third inning, retiring the last 11 batters he faced
Detmers' performance was a good start as he looks to end the season in good form
